text: aur (ai rasool) na to yahoodee kabhee tumase razaamand hoge na nasaara yahaan tak ki tum unake mazahab kee pairavee karo (ai rasool unase) kah do ki bas khuda hee kee hidaayat to hidaayat hai (baaqee dhakosala hai) aur agar tum isake baad bhee ki tumhaare paas ilm (quraan) aa chuka hai unakee khvaahishon par chale to (yaad rahe ki phir) tumako khuda (ke gazab) se bachaane vaala na koee saraparast hoga na madadagaar
